    • Constructor Detail

      • CorruptionBarMeter

        public CorruptionBarMeter(Vector2 position,
                          Vector2 theSize,
                          float max,
                          float losepercent)
        Instatiates a new CorruptionBarMeter
        Parameters:
        position - position to put the Meter
        theSize - size of the meter
        max - maximum value (possible values represented by meter is 0-max)
        losepercent - this percent (0-1f) on the bar will have a skull marker placed there.

    • Method Detail

      • updateBar

        public void updateBar()
        This method forces the value within bounds and then sets the texture of the skull icon accordingly. at 33% of losePercent, line turns yellow at 66% of losePercent, line turns orange at 100% of losePercent, like turns red

      • setLosePercent

        public void setLosePercent(float losepercent)
        sets the losePercent marker
        Parameters:
        losepercent - percentace point to place the marker

      • getLosePercent

        public float getLosePercent()
        gets the losePercent
        Returns:
        the percentage setting of the lose percent marker (0-1f)

      • draw

        public void draw()
        draws the BarMeter

        draw in class BarMeter
